name: Auto Remark Updater

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '*/10 * * * *'
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  update-subs:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout main branch
      uses: actions/checkout@v3
      with:
        ref: main  # محتوای برنچ main رو می‌گیریم

    - name: Copy script from automation branch
      run: |
        git fetch origin automation
        git checkout origin/automation -- change_remark_all_types.py

    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.x'

    - name: Run updater
      run: python change_remark_all_types.py "epodonios"

    - name: Commit changes to main
      run: |
        git config --global user.name "github-actions[bot]"
        git config --global user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
        git add Sub*.txt
        git commit -m "🔁 Auto remark update" || echo "No changes"
        git push origin main
